channel.title: Safe Pking
channel.description: I was wondering how to make a pk area, im trying to make it in castle wars and im doing this in my "client" file, [code]|| (absX >= 2400 && absX <= 2476 && absY >= 3103 && absY <=3150)) return true; else return false; [/code] and this is a 317 server, and the code above is the last one in the "public boolean multiCombat() {"

item.title: Safe Pking
item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

I was wondering how to make a pk area, im trying to make it in castle wars and im doing this in my “client” file,

|| (absX >= 2400 && absX <= 2476 && absY >= 3103 && absY <=3150)) return true; else return false;
and this is a 317 server, and the code above is the last one in the “public boolean multiCombat() {”

Read full topic
